Name: De Buurvrouw
Review Text: Love this place. Great bar, great place as after hour bar in Amsterdam. Great bar with fast service,v even when it's crowded drink service is done in a timely manner. Quirky and cool, visit when you're in Amsterdam, you'll be happy to try out this genuinely cool bar.

Name: De Buurvrouw
Review Text: Good music, good and funny bartenders, drinks are very reasonable and good

Name: De Buurvrouw
Review Text: We have spent some great late nights here back in the day during the early daze of our book. :) With a central location, yet local vibe, great tunes and a full bar, what more could you ask for?  I've recently reminded our S-Guide crew to go visit this place, so there will be a new review coming soon!

Name: De Buurvrouw
Review Text: Great local pub! Opens later, around 11 at least when I was last in Amsterdam. Good music and bar staff is extremely nice! Great prices as well, cheapest good beer you're having in this area without a doubt.

Review Text: Typical dive bar with an ecclectic crowd.  Cheap booze and open till late.  Smoking allowed after 01:30!
